    • Constructor Detail

      • URIProvider

        public URIProvider(java.lang.String uriPrefix,
           java.lang.String providerPortURI,
           boolean isDistributed)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        create a component with a given uri prefix and that will expose its service through a port of the given URI.

        Contract

         pre    true                    // no precondition.
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        uriPrefix - the prefix of this provider
        providerPortURI - the URI of the port exposing the service
        isDistributed - true if distributed, otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

    • Method Detail

      • provideURIService

        public java.lang.String provideURIService()
        produce and return an URI beginning with a substring that identifies the provider. Starting point is to define the service methods of the server component.

        Contract

         pre    true                    // no precondition.
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Returns:
        the produced URI
